trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath storyteller is concerned about the risk of Dravanian attack.

TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_01<tab>The Vath storyteller asks you to gather silver dew. The plant grows on a raised area to the west of Tailfeather. Head there, collect three bunches of silver dew, and deliver them to the Vath storyteller.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_02<tab>You have found and gathered the silver dew. Return to Loth ast Vath and deliver it to the storyteller.

TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_SEQ_03<tab>The storyteller explains to you how the Vath have avoided Dravanian attacks for so long: burning silver dew produces a strong-smelling smoke. Dragons cannot stand the smell of this smoke and avoid the area of Loth ast Vath altogether.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_TODO_00<tab>Gather three bunches of silver dew.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the silver dew to the Vath storyteller.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_000<tab>Greetings, generous hunter. I would make another request of you. <click> <click> Please gather three bunches of silver dew and bring them back to us.

TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_001<tab>Silver dew can be found near Tailfeather. There stands a raised area, west of Tailfeather, where the plant grows. Gather the plants there, then bring them back to us here.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_010<tab>Have you found the silver dew? It grows to the west of Tailfeather.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_100_020<tab><click> <click> Do you have the silver dew?
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_020<tab>Thank you, hunter. We can now feel safe.
TEXT_HEAVNZ223_01792_STORYTELLER_000_031<tab>The smell of burning silver dew─the smoke it produces─is unbearable to dragons. It will keep them away, making Loth ast Vath safe─for a time.
